member.name: T:DHI.Services.TimeSeries.WebApi.TimeSeriesAnalysisController
member.summary: Time Series Analysis API

member.name: M:DHI.Services.TimeSeries.WebApi.TimeSeriesAnalysisController.GetMin(System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Gets the minimum value for the given time series within the given time interval.
member.remarks: The 'from' and 'to' query parameters can be omitted. If no time interval is given, the analysis is performed on the entire range of time series values.
member.response: No content. Time series ID or dateTimes not found.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.TimeSeries.WebApi.TimeSeriesAnalysisController.GetMinList(System.String,System.String[],System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Gets a list of minimum values for the given list of time series within the given time interval.
member.remarks: The 'from' and 'to' query parameters can be omitted. If no time interval is given, the analysis is performed on the entire range of time series values.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.TimeSeries.WebApi.TimeSeriesAnalysisController.GetMax(System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Gets the maximum value for the given time series within the given time interval.
member.remarks: The 'from' and 'to' query parameters can be omitted. If no time interval is given, the analysis is performed on the entire range of time series values.
member.response: No content. Time series ID or dateTimes not found.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.TimeSeries.WebApi.TimeSeriesAnalysisController.GetMaxList(System.String,System.String[],System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Gets a list of maximum values for the given list of time series within the given time interval.
member.remarks: The 'from' and 'to' query parameters can be omitted. If no time interval is given, the analysis is performed on the entire range of time series values.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.TimeSeries.WebApi.TimeSeriesAnalysisController.GetSum(System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Gets the sum value for the given time series within the given time interval.
member.remarks: The 'from' and 'to' query parameters can be omitted. If no time interval is given, the analysis is performed on the entire range of time series values.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.TimeSeries.WebApi.TimeSeriesAnalysisController.GetSumList(System.String,System.String[],System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Gets a list of sum values for the given list of time series within the given time interval.
member.remarks: The 'from' and 'to' query parameters can be omitted. If no time interval is given, the analysis is performed on the entire range of time series values.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.TimeSeries.WebApi.TimeSeriesAnalysisController.GetAverage(System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Gets the average value for the given time series within the given time interval.
member.remarks: The 'from' and 'to' query parameters can be omitted. If no time interval is given, the analysis is performed on the entire range of time series values.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.TimeSeries.WebApi.TimeSeriesAnalysisController.GetAverageList(System.String,System.String[],System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Gets a list of average values for the given list of time series within the given time interval.
member.remarks: The 'from' and 'to' query parameters can be omitted. If no time interval is given, the analysis is performed on the entire range of time series values.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.TimeSeries.WebApi.TimeSeriesAnalysisController.GetMovingAverage(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Gets the moving average over the given window for the given time series within the given time interval.
member.remarks: The 'window' query parameter is mandatory and is an integer defining the number of data points in the window. The 'from' and 'to' query parameters can be omitted. If no time interval is given, the analysis is performed on the entire range of time series values.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.TimeSeries.WebApi.TimeSeriesAnalysisController.GetReduced(System.String,System.String,System.Double,System.Int32,System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Gets a reduced (simplified) time series using the Ramer–Douglas–Peucker algorithm of the given time series within the given time interval.
member.remarks: The 'tolerance' query parameter is optional. The tolerance is a relative tolerance expressed as a percentage of the difference between maximum and minimum value within the analysed time interval. If no tolerance is given, the default value is 2%. The 'minimumcount' query parameter is optional. The minimumcount defines at threshold value for ignoring the request to reduce the times series. If, for example, the minimum count is set to 1000, and the number of data points within the given time interval is less than 1000, the reduction request will be ignored, and the complete time series will be returned. If no minimum count is given, the default value is 3000 data points. The 'from' and 'to' query parameters can be omitted. If no time interval is given, the analysis is performed on the entire range of time series values.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.TimeSeries.WebApi.TimeSeriesAnalysisController.GetReducedList(System.String,System.String[],System.Double,System.Int32,System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Gets a list of reduced (simplified) time series using the Ramer–Douglas–Peucker algorithm of the given list of time series within the given time interval.
member.remarks: The 'tolerance' query parameter is optional. The tolerance is a relative tolerance expressed as a percentage of the difference between maximum and minimum value within the analysed time interval. If no tolerance is given, the default value is 2%. The 'minimumcount' query parameter is optional. The minimumcount defines at threshold value for ignoring the request to reduce the times series. If, for example, the minimum count is set to 1000, and the number of data points within the given time interval is less than 1000, the reduction request will be ignored, and the complete time series will be returned. If no minimum count is given, the default value is 3000 data points. The 'from' and 'to' query parameters can be omitted. If no time interval is given, the analysis is performed on the entire range of time series values.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.TimeSeries.WebApi.TimeSeriesAnalysisController.GetPercentile(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Gets the value (percentile) below below which a given percentage of values within the given time interval fall.
member.remarks: The 'from' and 'to' query parameters can be omitted. If no time interval is given, the analysis is performed on the entire range of time series values.
member.response: No content. Time series ID or dateTimes not found.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.TimeSeries.WebApi.TimeSeriesAnalysisController.GetPercentileList(System.String,System.String[],System.Int32,System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Gets a list of percentile values for the given list of time series within the given time interval.
member.remarks: The 'from' and 'to' query parameters can be omitted. If no time interval is given, the analysis is performed on the entire range of time series values.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.TimeSeries.WebApi.TimeSeriesAnalysisController.GetResampled(System.String,System.String,System.TimeSpan,System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Gets a resampled time series within the given time interval with time steps equivalent to the given time span.
member.remarks: The time series values are found using interpolation according to the time series data type. The timespan query parameter is mandatory. The from and to query parameters are optional. If no time interval is given, the analysis is performed on the entire range of time series values.

member.name: T:DHI.Services.TimeSeries.WebApi.TimeSeriesController
member.summary: Time Series API

member.name: M:DHI.Services.TimeSeries.WebApi.TimeSeriesController.Add(System.String,DHI.Services.TimeSeries.WebApi.TimeSeriesDTO)
member.summary: Adds a new time series.
member.remarks: The only required information in the request body is the FullName. However, some connection types might require additional information such as DataType, Quantity and Unit. If the connection type is not a grouped (hierarchical) connection type, the FullName should be a simple flat time series ID. NOTE: Only applicable if the connection type is updatable.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.TimeSeries.WebApi.TimeSeriesController.Update(System.String,DHI.Services.TimeSeries.WebApi.TimeSeriesDTO)
member.summary: Updates an existing time series.
member.remarks: The only required information in the request body is the FullName. If the connection type is not a grouped (hierarchical) connection type, the FullName should be a simple flat time series ID. The updated data and/or meta data will depend on the other information given in the request body. NOTE: Only applicable if the connection type is updatable.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.TimeSeries.WebApi.TimeSeriesController.SetValues(System.String,System.String,DHI.Services.TimeSeries.WebApi.TimeSeriesDataDTO)
member.summary: Sets some time series values for the time series with the given ID.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.TimeSeries.WebApi.TimeSeriesController.Delete(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Deletes a time series with the given ID.
member.remarks: NOTE: Only applicable if the connection type is updatable.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.TimeSeries.WebApi.TimeSeriesController.DeleteValues(System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Deletes the time series values for the given time series within the given time interval.
member.remarks: NOTE: Only applicable if the connection type is updatable.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.TimeSeries.WebApi.TimeSeriesController.Get(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the time series with the specified identifier.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.TimeSeries.WebApi.TimeSeriesController.GetCount(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the total number of time series.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.TimeSeries.WebApi.TimeSeriesController.GetDateTimes(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets a list of all datetimes for the time series with the given identifier.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.TimeSeries.WebApi.TimeSeriesController.GetFirstDateTime(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the first date time for the time series with the given identifier.
member.response: No content. Time series not found.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.TimeSeries.WebApi.TimeSeriesController.GetFirstValue(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the first value (corresponding to the first time step) for the given time series.
member.remarks: If the time series does not contain any data, null is returned.
member.response: No content. Time series not found

member.name: M:DHI.Services.TimeSeries.WebApi.TimeSeriesController.GetFirstValueList(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Gets the first value (corresponding to the first time step) for the given list of time series

member.name: M:DHI.Services.TimeSeries.WebApi.TimeSeriesController.GetFirstValueAfter(System.String,System.String,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Returns the first value after the given datetime for the given time series.
member.remarks: A datetime value is given as a modified ISO 8601 format (with the ":" separators in the time specification omitted). If the time series does not contain any data, null is returned.
member.response: No content. Time series not found

member.name: M:DHI.Services.TimeSeries.WebApi.TimeSeriesController.GetFullNames(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets a list of time series full-name identifiers.
member.remarks: NOTE: Only applicable if the connection type is grouped (hierarchical). If a group is given, a list of time series full-name identifiers within the given group (recursive) is retrieved.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.TimeSeries.WebApi.TimeSeriesController.GetIds(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a list of all time series IDs.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.TimeSeries.WebApi.TimeSeriesController.GetLastDateTime(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the last datetime for the given time series.
member.remarks: If the time series does not contain any data, null is returned.
member.response: No content. Time series not found.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.TimeSeries.WebApi.TimeSeriesController.GetLastValue(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the last value (corresponding to the last time step) for the given time series.
member.remarks: If the time series does not contain any data, null is returned.
member.response: No content. Time series not found

member.name: M:DHI.Services.TimeSeries.WebApi.TimeSeriesController.GetLastValueList(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Gets the last value (corresponding to the last time step) for the given list of time series

member.name: M:DHI.Services.TimeSeries.WebApi.TimeSeriesController.GetLastValueBefore(System.String,System.String,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Gets the last value before the given datetime for the given time series.
member.remarks: If the time series does not contain any data, null is returned.
member.response: No content. Time series not found

member.name: M:DHI.Services.TimeSeries.WebApi.TimeSeriesController.GetList(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets a list of time series.
member.remarks: If no group is given, a list of all time series is retrieved. If a group is given, a list of time series within the given group (recursive) is retrieved. This is only applicable if the connection type is grouped (hierarchical).

member.name: M:DHI.Services.TimeSeries.WebApi.TimeSeriesController.GetListByGroups(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Gets a list of time series within the given list of groups (recursive).
member.remarks: NOTE: This is only applicable if the connection type is grouped (hierarchical).

member.name: M:DHI.Services.TimeSeries.WebApi.TimeSeriesController.GetValue(System.String,System.String,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Gets the value at the given datetime for the given time series.
member.response: No content. Time series ID or dateTime not found.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.TimeSeries.WebApi.TimeSeriesController.GetValues(System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Gets a list of all values for the given time series within the given time interval.
member.remarks: All combinations of the optional from and to parameters are possible.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.TimeSeries.WebApi.TimeSeriesController.GetValuesList(System.String,System.String[],System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Gets a list of values within the given time interval for the given list of time series.
member.remarks: All combinations of the optional from and to parameters are possible.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.TimeSeries.WebApi.TimeSeriesController.GetVectors(System.String,DHI.Services.TimeSeries.WebApi.ComponentsDTO,System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Gets a list of vectors within the given time interval for the given X- and Y-component time series.
member.remarks: All combinations of the optional from and to parameters are possible.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.TimeSeries.WebApi.TimeSeriesController.GetVectorsList(System.String,DHI.Services.TimeSeries.WebApi.ComponentsDTO[],System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Gets a list of vectors within the given time interval for the given list of X- and Y-component time series.
member.remarks: All combinations of the optional from and to parameters are possible.
member.param: The list of component time series ids.
